
Koregaon is a village in the Gadchiroli district  with an area of 597.8 hectares, harbouring 1143 households and with total population of 4446 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town is DESAIGANJ at a distance of > 10 km.

There are 4 primary schools in the village
There are 2 Middle schools in the village
There is 1 Secondary school in the village
There is 1 Senior secondary school in the village

The nearest Engineering college is at a distance of > 10 km from the village.
